googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.earlyVotingNotesCombined:
* Vote Centers for the November 3 General Election will open Tuesday, October 27, 2020, through Monday, November 2, 2020, from 8:30 am - 7:00 pm. 

* On November 3, 2020 (Election Day), Vote Centers will open from 7:00 am – 8:00 pm.
googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.vbmAbsenteeBallotRulesCombined:
* Due to COVID-19, all registered DC voters will be sent a mail-in ballot for the November 3, 2020 election.
* You can still request a one-time absentee ballot if you will be temporarily out of town during a specific election.
googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.idRequirementsOvr: DC voters must be able to sign the form by touchscreen or to upload a signature. DC voters must include their DC driver's license number, state ID number, or the last 4 digits of their social security number with their online voter registration application.
googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.idRequirementsSdr: DC voters must provide their DC driver's license number, state ID number, or the last four digits of their social security number with their voter registration application. Voters must also physically show a valid document with their name and address --- such as their driver's license, bank statement, or utility bill.
googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.registrationRules:
To register in the District of Columbia you must:

  * be a citizen of the United States
  * be a District of Columbia resident at least 30 days preceding the next election
  * be at least 18 years old on or preceding the next election
  * not be in prison for a felony conviction
  * not have been judged legally incompetent by a court of law
  * not claim the right to vote anywhere outside DC
googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.earlyVotingByMailInfoCombined:
* Vote Centers for the November 3 General Election will open Tuesday, October 27, 2020, through Monday, November 2, 2020, from 8:30 am - 7:00 pm. 

* On November 3, 2020 (Election Day), Vote Centers will open from 7:00 am – 8:00 pm.
